af.title: Bloeddruk Monitering - AHA KategorieÃ« & Tendense | CardioAnalytics
af.description: Monitor bloeddruk met AHA kategorie klassifikasies (Normaal <120/80, Stadium 1, Stadium 2). Volg sistoliese/diastoliese tendense en verminder beroerte en MI risiko.
af.content: Bloeddruk Monitering Volg sistoliese en diastoliese druk met AHA kategorie-klassifikasies Wat is Bloeddruk? Bloeddruk is die krag van bloed wat teen arterie-mure druk, gemeet in millimeters kwik (mmHg). Dit het twee komponente: Sistoliese druk - Die boonste getal, meet druk wanneer die hart klop (kontraheer) Diastoliese druk - Die onderste getal, meet druk wanneer die hart tussen kloppings rus Voorbeeld: 'n Lesing van 120/80 mmHg beteken 120 sistolies en 80 diastolies. en.description: Track 11 cardiovascular and mobility metrics from Apple Health. Heart rate, blood pressure, HRV, SpOâ‚‚, ECG, VOâ‚‚ Max and more. Privacy-first iOS app.
en.content:
{% extends "base.html" %}

{% block content %} App Store Metadata App Name CardioAnalytics Subtitle Heart Health Tracking Description Monitor your cardiovascular health with CardioAnalytics - a comprehensive, privacy-first iOS app
            that tracks 11 essential heart health and mobility metrics from Apple HealthKit. Track heart rate, blood pressure, HRV, SpOâ‚‚, ECG, VOâ‚‚ Max, walking speed, and more.
            All data stays on your device with complete on-device processing. KEY FEATURES:

en.title: Blood Pressure Monitoring - AHA Categories & Trends | CardioAnalytics
en.description: Monitor blood pressure with AHA category classifications (Normal <120/80, Stage 1, Stage 2). Track systolic/diastolic trends and reduce stroke and MI risk.
en.content: Blood Pressure Monitoring Track systolic and diastolic pressure with AHA category classifications What is Blood Pressure? Blood pressure is the force of blood pushing against artery walls, measured in millimeters of mercury (mmHg). It has two components: Systolic pressure - The top number, measuring pressure when the heart beats (contracts) Diastolic pressure - The bottom number, measuring pressure when the heart rests between beats Example: A reading of 120/80 mmHg means 120 systolic and 80 dia

en.title: ECG & Atrial Fibrillation Detection - FDA-Cleared Apple Watch | CardioAnalytics
en.description: Store ECG recordings and AF classifications from FDA-cleared Apple Watch. Track AF burden, irregular pulse alerts, 95% sensitivity/specificity (JACC meta-analysis).
en.content: ECG & Atrial Fibrillation Detection FDA-cleared Apple Watch ECG and AF burden tracking What are ECG and Atrial Fibrillation? ECG (Electrocardiogram) - Recording of the heart's electrical activity. Apple Watch provides single-lead ECG recordings. Atrial Fibrillation (AF) - Irregular heart rhythm where the atria quiver instead of contracting normally. Can increase stroke risk. Why ECG and AF Detection Matter FDA-cleared Apple Watch ECG can detect atrial fibrillation with high accuracy. The Apple H

en.title: CardioAnalytics Features - Personalized Dashboard, Medication Tracking & Alerts
en.description: Track 11 cardiovascular metrics with personalized dashboard, medication adherence, evidence-based alerts, symptom logging, and shareable reports. All data stays on-device.
en.content: CardioAnalytics Features Complete cardiovascular health tracking with personalized dashboard, medication adherence, evidence-based alerts, and privacy by design Personalized Dashboard Track all 11 cardiovascular and mobility metrics in one unified view. See trends, compare against guideline ranges, and monitor changes at a glance. Resting and walking heart rate - Monitor cardiovascular status with normal range indicators (60-100 bpm) Blood pressure tracking - AHA category bands (Normal <120/80,

en.title: HealthKit Integration - Background Sync & Data Types | CardioAnalytics
en.description: Comprehensive guide to CardioAnalytics HealthKit integration. 11 data types, anchored queries, background delivery, write-back capabilities.
en.content: HealthKit Integration Complete technical reference for CardioAnalytics HealthKit data types and sync patterns HealthKit Data Types Used CardioAnalytics reads 11 cardiovascular and mobility metrics from Apple HealthKit using first-party identifiers: Heart Rate Metrics HKQuantityTypeIdentifier.heartRate - Current heart rate (counts/min) ( Apple Docs ) restingHeartRate - Resting heart rate baseline ( Apple Docs ) walkingHeartRateAverage - Average HR during walking Cardiovascular Metrics bloodPressu

en.title: Heart Rate Tracking - Resting, Walking & Current HR | CardioAnalytics
en.description: Track resting, walking, and current heart rate from Apple Watch. Understand normal ranges (60-100 bpm), detect bradycardia and tachycardia with personalized thresholds.
en.content: Heart Rate Tracking Monitor resting, walking, and current heart rate for cardiovascular health assessment What is Heart Rate? Heart rate is the number of times your heart beats per minute (bpm). It's measured at different activity levels: Resting Heart Rate - Measured when completely at rest, ideally in the morning before getting out of bed Walking Heart Rate - Average heart rate during steady walking activity Current Heart Rate - Real-time measurement at any given moment Why Heart Rate Matters

en.title: How CardioAnalytics Works - HealthKit Sync & Background Updates
en.description: Learn how CardioAnalytics syncs with Apple HealthKit for real-time cardiovascular data, background updates, and write-back capabilities. Privacy-first data processing.
en.content: How CardioAnalytics Works Seamless HealthKit integration for automatic cardiovascular data sync with complete privacy and control HealthKit Sync Overview CardioAnalytics integrates with Apple HealthKit to automatically import and track 11 cardiovascular and mobility metrics. All data processing happens locally on your iPhone with no cloud uploads or external servers. 1 Authorize HealthKit Access Grant permission to read specific data types from Apple Health. You choose exactly which metrics to s

en.title: Heart Rate Variability (HRV) - SDNN & RMSSD Tracking | CardioAnalytics
en.description: Monitor HRV metrics (SDNN, RMSSD) to assess cardiovascular health and stress levels. Low HRV linked to worse health outcomes. Track nightly trends.
en.content: Heart Rate Variability (HRV) Monitor SDNN and RMSSD metrics to assess cardiovascular health and stress levels What is Heart Rate Variability? Heart Rate Variability (HRV) measures the variation in time between consecutive heartbeats. It's a marker of autonomic nervous system function and overall cardiovascular health. HRV Metrics: SDNN (Standard Deviation of NN intervals) - Measures overall HRV. Reflects total autonomic nervous system activity. RMSSD (Root Mean Square of Successive Differences)

en.title: Privacy Policy - CardioAnalytics | Privacy by Design
en.description: CardioAnalytics stores all health data locally on your device. Granular HealthKit authorization, no cloud storage, complete data control. Privacy by design.
en.content: Privacy Policy Last updated: January 2025 1. Introduction Welcome to CardioAnalytics ("we," "our," or "us"). Your privacy is fundamental to our design philosophy. This privacy policy explains our privacy-first approach and how we handle your health data. Core principle: Your health data stays on your device. Always. 2. en.title: Oxygen Saturation (SpOâ‚‚) Tracking - Hypoxemia Detection | CardioAnalytics
en.description: Track oxygen saturation levels from Apple Watch. Normal range 95-100%, alerts for values <90% (hypoxemia). Monitor respiratory and cardiovascular health.
en.content: Oxygen Saturation (SpOâ‚‚) Monitor blood oxygen levels to assess respiratory and cardiovascular health What is Oxygen Saturation? Oxygen saturation (SpOâ‚‚) is the percentage of hemoglobin in your blood that's carrying oxygen. It's measured using pulse oximetry (typically via Apple Watch or dedicated devices). A reading of 98% SpOâ‚‚ means 98% of your hemoglobin molecules are saturated with oxygen. Why Oxygen Saturation Matters SpOâ‚‚ reflects how well your lungs are oxygenating blood and how effectivel

en.title: Stair Ascent Speed - Functional Capacity & Leg Power | CardioAnalytics
en.description: Monitor stair ascent speed from Apple Watch to assess functional capacity and leg power. Track meaningful declines in mobility.
en.content: Stair Ascent Speed Monitor functional capacity and leg power with stair climbing metrics What is Stair Ascent Speed? Stair ascent speed is the average speed you climb stairs, measured in meters per second (m/s). Apple Watch automatically records this metric when you climb stairs. Why Stair Ascent Speed Matters Stair climbing ability is a strong indicator of functional capacity and overall health: Reflects leg power - Requires strength, balance, and cardiovascular fitness Functional independence

en.title: Support & FAQ - CardioAnalytics Help Center
en.description: Get help with CardioAnalytics. Frequently asked questions about VOâ‚‚ Max accuracy, AF detection, missing metrics, and more. Contact support.
en.content: Support & FAQ Get help with CardioAnalytics. Frequently asked questions and contact information. Frequently Asked Questions How accurate is Apple Watch VOâ‚‚ Max? Wrist-based VOâ‚‚ Max is an estimate that may differ from lab testing. Recent studies show non-trivial measurement error compared to gold-standard indirect calorimetry ( PLOS ONE 2025 ). CardioAnalytics emphasizes trends and relative changes over time rather than absolute values. Focus on whether your VOâ‚‚ Max is improving or declining, not

en.title: VOâ‚‚ Max Tracking - Cardio Fitness & Mortality Marker | CardioAnalytics
en.description: Track VOâ‚‚ Max trends from Apple Watch. Strong fitness and mortality marker. Understand accuracy limitations vs lab testing (PLOS ONE 2025).
en.content: VOâ‚‚ Max Tracking Monitor cardio fitness and mortality risk marker What is VOâ‚‚ Max? VOâ‚‚ Max (maximal oxygen uptake) is the maximum amount of oxygen your body can use during intense exercise, measured in milliliters per kilogram of body weight per minute (mL/kg/min). It's considered the gold standard measure of aerobic fitness and cardiovascular capacity. Why VOâ‚‚ Max Matters VOâ‚‚ Max is a strong predictor of all-cause mortality - one of the most powerful markers of overall health and longevity: Hig

en.title: Walking Asymmetry - Gait Balance & Fall Risk | CardioAnalytics
en.description: Track walking asymmetry percentage to assess gait imbalance and fall risk. Apple Mobility metrics validated for functional assessment.
en.content: Walking Asymmetry Assess gait balance and fall risk with Apple Mobility metrics What is Walking Asymmetry? Walking asymmetry is the percentage of time one foot's steps are faster or slower than the other foot. It measures gait imbalance and unevenness in walking patterns. Apple defines and validates walking asymmetry through iPhone Mobility metrics ( Apple Whitepaper PDF ). Why Walking Asymmetry Matters Higher walking asymmetry indicates gait imbalance and increased fall risk: Fall risk indicato

en.title: Walking Speed Tracking - The Sixth Vital Sign | CardioAnalytics
en.description: Monitor walking speed as the sixth vital sign. Speeds <0.8 m/s indicate higher risk (JAMA 2011). Track gait speed trends for health outcomes.
en.content: Walking Speed Tracking Monitor the "sixth vital sign" for functional capacity and health outcomes What is Walking Speed? Walking speed (also called gait speed) is the average speed you walk at a steady pace, measured in meters per second (m/s). Apple Watch and iPhone automatically measure walking speed during regular activity. Why Walking Speed Matters: The "Sixth Vital Sign" Walking speed is often called the "sixth vital sign" because it's such a powerful predictor of health outcomes ( JAMA 201

en.content: Weight & BMI Tracking Monitor body weight and body mass index for cardiovascular health What are Weight and BMI? id.description: Pantau tekanan darah dengan klasifikasi kategori AHA (Normal <120/80, Stage 1, Stage 2). Lacak tren sistolik/diastolik dan kurangi risiko stroke dan MI.
id.content: Pemantauan Tekanan Darah Lacak tekanan darah sistolik dan diastolik dengan kategorisasi AHA untuk manajemen kesehatan kardiovaskular Apa Itu Tekanan Darah? Tekanan darah adalah kekuatan darah yang mendorong dinding arteri Anda saat jantung memompa darah. Ini diukur dalam milimeter air raksa (mmHg) dan dinyatakan sebagai dua angka: Tekanan sistolik (angka atas) - Tekanan di arteri Anda saat jantung berdetak Tekanan diastolik (angka bawah) - Tekanan di arteri Anda saat jantung istirahat di antara

id.content: ECG & Fibrilasi Atrium Simpan rekaman ECG Apple Watch dan pantau notifikasi fibrilasi atrium Apa Itu Fibrilasi Atrium? Fibrilasi Atrium (AF atau AFib) adalah jenis aritmia jantung yang paling umum. Ini adalah denyut jantung tidak teratur dan sering cepat yang dapat meningkatkan risiko stroke, gagal jantung, dan komplikasi jantung lainnya. id.description: Pantau saturasi oksigen darah dengan Apple Watch Series 6+. Lacak SpOâ‚‚ nokturnal untuk deteksi apnea tidur. Peringatan hipoksemia untuk SpOâ‚‚ <95%.
id.content: Pemantauan Saturasi Oksigen (SpOâ‚‚) Pantau tingkat oksigen darah Anda untuk kesehatan pernapasan dan kardiovaskular Apa Itu Saturasi Oksigen? Saturasi Oksigen (SpOâ‚‚) mengukur persentase hemoglobin dalam darah Anda yang membawa oksigen. Ini adalah indikator kunci seberapa baik paru-paru Anda mentransfer oksigen ke dalam darah dan seberapa efisien jantung Anda memompa darah yang kaya oksigen ke seluruh tubuh Anda. id.content: Pemantauan VOâ‚‚ Max Lacak kapasitas aerobik Anda dan prediktor kuat risiko mortalitas Apa Itu VOâ‚‚ Max? VOâ‚‚ Max (konsumsi oksigen maksimum) adalah jumlah oksigen maksimum yang dapat digunakan tubuh Anda selama latihan intens. Ini dinyatakan dalam mililiter oksigen per kilogram berat badan per menit (ml/kg/menit). VOâ‚‚ Max adalah standar emas untuk kebugaran kardiorespirasi dan prediktor kuat kesehatan jangka panjang. id.description: Pantau asimetri gaya berjalan dengan metrik Apple Mobility yang tervalidasi. Deteksi masalah keseimbangan, kelemahan, atau ketidakseimbangan. Kurangi risiko jatuh.
id.content: Asimetri Berjalan Nilai keseimbangan gaya berjalan dan risiko jatuh Apa Itu Asimetri Berjalan? Asimetri Berjalan mengukur perbedaan persentase dalam waktu saat setiap kaki bersentuhan dengan tanah saat berjalan. Gaya berjalan yang seimbang memiliki asimetri rendah, sementara asimetri tinggi dapat menunjukkan masalah dengan keseimbangan, kekuatan, atau mobilitas. Mengapa Asimetri Berjalan Penting Deteksi risiko jatuh - Asimetri tinggi meningkatkan risiko jatuh Cedera atau kelemahan - Dapat menunj

id.title: Kecepatan Berjalan - Tanda Vital Keenam untuk Kesehatan Fungsional | CardioAnalytics
id.description: Lacak kecepatan berjalan sebagai prediktor kesehatan dan umur panjang. Kecepatan <0,8 m/detik menunjukkan risiko lebih tinggi. Pantau kesehatan fungsional dari waktu ke waktu.
id.content: Kecepatan Berjalan Pantau "tanda vital keenam" untuk kesehatan fungsional Apa Itu Kecepatan Berjalan? Kecepatan berjalan adalah kecepatan Anda berjalan dengan kecepatan normal dan nyaman, biasanya diukur dalam meter per detik (m/detik). Ini telah disebut sebagai "tanda vital keenam" karena kekuatan prediktifnya untuk kesehatan dan umur panjang. Mengapa Kecepatan Berjalan Penting Prediktor mortalitas - Kecepatan berjalan lambat dikaitkan dengan risiko kematian lebih tinggi Kesehatan fungsional -

it.content:

            that tracks 11 essential heart health and mobility metrics from Apple HealthKit. Track heart rate, blood pressure, HRV, SpOâ‚‚, ECG, VOâ‚‚ Max, walking speed, and more.
            All data stays on your device with complete on-device processing. KEY FEATURES:

it.title: Monitoraggio pressione sanguigna - Categorie AHA e tendenze | CardioAnalytics
it.description: Monitora la pressione sanguigna con classificazioni delle categorie AHA (Normale <120/80, Stadio 1, Stadio 2). Traccia tendenze sistoliche/diastoliche e riduci il rischio di ictus e infarto.
it.content: Blood Pressure Monitoring Track systolic and diastolic pressure with AHA category classifications What is Blood Pressure? Blood pressure is the force of blood pushing against artery walls, measured in millimeters of mercury (mmHg). It has two components: Systolic pressure - The top number, measuring pressure when the heart beats (contracts) Diastolic pressure - The bottom number, measuring pressure when the heart rests between beats Example: A reading of 120/80 mmHg means 120 systolic and 80 dia

it.title: ECG e fibrillazione atriale - Rilevamento approvato FDA | CardioAnalytics
it.description: Archivia registrazioni ECG Apple Watch approvate dalla FDA. Traccia il carico di fibrillazione atriale e notifiche di polso irregolare con sensibilitÃ  e specificitÃ  del 95%. Rilevamento precoce della fibrillazione atriale.
it.content: ECG & Atrial Fibrillation Detection FDA-cleared Apple Watch ECG and AF burden tracking What are ECG and Atrial Fibrillation? ECG (Electrocardiogram) - Recording of the heart's electrical activity. Apple Watch provides single-lead ECG recordings. Atrial Fibrillation (AF) - Irregular heart rhythm where the atria quiver instead of contracting normally. Can increase stroke risk. Why ECG and AF Detection Matter FDA-cleared Apple Watch ECG can detect atrial fibrillation with high accuracy. The Apple H

it.description: Monitora 11 parametri cardiovascolari con dashboard personalizzato, aderenza ai farmaci, avvisi basati sull'evidenza, registrazione sintomi e report condivisibili. Tutti i dati rimangono sul dispositivo.
it.content: FunzionalitÃ  di CardioAnalytics Monitoraggio completo della salute cardiovascolare con dashboard personalizzato, aderenza ai farmaci, avvisi basati sull'evidenza e privacy by design Dashboard personalizzato Traccia tutti gli 11 parametri cardiovascolari e di mobilitÃ  in una vista unificata. it.title: Integrazione HealthKit - Tipi di dati e pattern di sincronizzazione | CardioAnalytics
it.description: Riferimento tecnico completo per i tipi di dati CardioAnalytics HealthKit. Query ancorate, consegna in background, capacitÃ  di scrittura. Integrazione perfetta con Apple Health.

it.description: Monitora frequenza cardiaca a riposo, durante camminata e attuale da Apple Watch. Comprendi i range normali (60-100 bpm), rileva bradicardia e tachicardia con soglie personalizzate.
it.content: Tracciamento della frequenza cardiaca Monitora frequenza cardiaca a riposo, durante la camminata e attuale per la valutazione della salute cardiovascolare Cos'Ã¨ la frequenza cardiaca? La frequenza cardiaca Ã¨ il numero di volte che il cuore batte al minuto (bpm). Viene misurata a diversi livelli di attivitÃ : Frequenza cardiaca a riposo - Misurata quando sei completamente a riposo, idealmente al mattino prima di alzarti dal letto Frequenza cardiaca durante la camminata - Frequenza cardiaca media d

it.title: Come funziona CardioAnalytics - Sincronizzazione HealthKit e aggiornamenti in background
it.description: Scopri come CardioAnalytics si sincronizza con Apple HealthKit per dati cardiovascolari in tempo reale, aggiornamenti in background e capacitÃ  di scrittura. Elaborazione dati che protegge la privacy.
it.content: Come funziona CardioAnalytics Integrazione perfetta con HealthKit per la sincronizzazione automatica dei dati cardiovascolari con privacy e controllo completi Panoramica della sincronizzazione HealthKit CardioAnalytics si integra con Apple HealthKit per importare e tracciare automaticamente 11 parametri cardiovascolari e di mobilitÃ . Tutta l'elaborazione dei dati avviene localmente sul tuo iPhone senza caricamenti cloud o server esterni. 1 Autorizza l'accesso a HealthKit Concedi il permesso di l

it.title: VariabilitÃ  della frequenza cardiaca (HRV) - Monitoraggio SDNN e RMSSD | CardioAnalytics
it.description: Monitora le metriche HRV (SDNN, RMSSD) per valutare la salute cardiovascolare e i livelli di stress. Un HRV basso Ã¨ collegato a esiti di salute peggiori. Traccia le tendenze notturne.
it.content: Heart Rate Variability (HRV) Monitor SDNN and RMSSD metrics to assess cardiovascular health and stress levels What is Heart Rate Variability? Heart Rate Variability (HRV) measures the variation in time between consecutive heartbeats. It's a marker of autonomic nervous system function and overall cardiovascular health. HRV Metrics: SDNN (Standard Deviation of NN intervals) - Measures overall HRV. Reflects total autonomic nervous system activity. RMSSD (Root Mean Square of Successive Differences)

it.title: Saturazione di ossigeno (SpOâ‚‚) - Monitoraggio salute respiratoria | CardioAnalytics
it.description: Monitora i livelli di SpOâ‚‚ con indicatori di range normale (95-100%). Ricevi avvisi per ipossiemia e traccia la salute respiratoria e cardiovascolare. Rilevamento precoce dei problemi.
it.content: Oxygen Saturation (SpOâ‚‚) Monitor blood oxygen levels to assess respiratory and cardiovascular health What is Oxygen Saturation? Oxygen saturation (SpOâ‚‚) is the percentage of hemoglobin in your blood that's carrying oxygen. It's measured using pulse oximetry (typically via Apple Watch or dedicated devices). A reading of 98% SpOâ‚‚ means 98% of your hemoglobin molecules are saturated with oxygen. Why Oxygen Saturation Matters SpOâ‚‚ reflects how well your lungs are oxygenating blood and how effectivel

it.title: VelocitÃ  di salita delle scale - Indicatore capacitÃ  funzionale | CardioAnalytics
it.description: Monitora la capacitÃ  funzionale e la potenza delle gambe con parametri di salita delle scale. Rileva precocemente significativi declini di mobilitÃ . Marker di salute complessiva.
it.content: Stair Ascent Speed Monitor functional capacity and leg power with stair climbing metrics What is Stair Ascent Speed? Stair ascent speed is the average speed you climb stairs, measured in meters per second (m/s). Apple Watch automatically records this metric when you climb stairs. Why Stair Ascent Speed Matters Stair climbing ability is a strong indicator of functional capacity and overall health: Reflects leg power - Requires strength, balance, and cardiovascular fitness Functional independence

it.title: Supporto e domande frequenti - Centro assistenza CardioAnalytics
it.description: Ottieni aiuto con CardioAnalytics. Domande frequenti sull'accuratezza del VOâ‚‚ Max, rilevamento fibrillazione atriale, parametri mancanti e altro. Contatta il supporto.
it.content: Supporto e domande frequenti Ottieni aiuto con CardioAnalytics. Domande frequenti e informazioni di contatto. Domande frequenti Quanto Ã¨ accurato il VOâ‚‚ Max di Apple Watch? Il VOâ‚‚ Max misurato al polso Ã¨ una stima che puÃ² differire dai test di laboratorio. Studi recenti mostrano errori di misurazione non trascurabili rispetto alla calorimetria indiretta gold-standard ( PLOS ONE 2025 ). CardioAnalytics enfatizza le tendenze e i cambiamenti relativi nel tempo piuttosto che i valori assoluti. Conce

it.title: VOâ‚‚ Max - Tracciamento forma cardiorespiratoria e marker mortalitÃ  | CardioAnalytics
it.description: Monitora la tua forma cardiorespiratoria con questo forte predittore del rischio di mortalitÃ . Traccia le tendenze nel tempo e analizza le zone di allenamento. Comprendi le limitazioni dell'accuratezza.
it.content: VOâ‚‚ Max Tracking Monitor cardio fitness and mortality risk marker What is VOâ‚‚ Max? VOâ‚‚ Max (maximal oxygen uptake) is the maximum amount of oxygen your body can use during intense exercise, measured in milliliters per kilogram of body weight per minute (mL/kg/min). It's considered the gold standard measure of aerobic fitness and cardiovascular capacity. Why VOâ‚‚ Max Matters VOâ‚‚ Max is a strong predictor of all-cause mortality - one of the most powerful markers of overall health and longevity: Hig

it.title: Asimmetria della camminata - Valutazione equilibrio andatura e rischio caduta | CardioAnalytics
it.description: Valuta l'equilibrio dell'andatura e il rischio di caduta con parametri Apple Mobility validati. Rileva problemi neuromuscolari precocemente. Monitoraggio completo della salute funzionale.
it.content: Walking Asymmetry Assess gait balance and fall risk with Apple Mobility metrics What is Walking Asymmetry? Walking asymmetry is the percentage of time one foot's steps are faster or slower than the other foot. It measures gait imbalance and unevenness in walking patterns. Apple defines and validates walking asymmetry through iPhone Mobility metrics ( Apple Whitepaper PDF ). Why Walking Asymmetry Matters Higher walking asymmetry indicates gait imbalance and increased fall risk: Fall risk indicato

it.title: VelocitÃ  di camminata - Il sesto segno vitale per capacitÃ  funzionale | CardioAnalytics
it.description: Traccia il sesto segno vitale per la salute funzionale. VelocitÃ  di camminata <0,8 m/s indica rischio maggiore. Monitora la tua capacitÃ  funzionale nel tempo con Apple Mobility.
it.content: Walking Speed Tracking Monitor the "sixth vital sign" for functional capacity and health outcomes What is Walking Speed? Walking speed (also called gait speed) is the average speed you walk at a steady pace, measured in meters per second (m/s). Apple Watch and iPhone automatically measure walking speed during regular activity. Why Walking Speed Matters: The "Sixth Vital Sign" Walking speed is often called the "sixth vital sign" because it's such a powerful predictor of health outcomes ( JAMA 201

it.title: Tracciamento peso e BMI - Monitoraggio composizione corporea | CardioAnalytics
it.description: Traccia peso corporeo e BMI con indicatori di range sano (18,5-24,9 kg/mÂ²). Monitora i fattori di rischio cardiovascolare nel tempo. Correlazioni con pressione sanguigna e farmaci.
it.content: Weight & BMI Tracking Monitor body weight and body mass index for cardiovascular health What are Weight and BMI? Body Weight - Your total body mass in kilograms (kg) or pounds (lbs) BMI (Body Mass Index) - Weight-to-height ratio calculated as weight (kg) / heightÂ² (mÂ²) Example: A person weighing 70 kg at 1.75 m tall has a BMI of 70 / (1.75Â²) = 22.9 kg/mÂ² Why Weight and BMI Matter for Cardiovascular Health Excess weight increases cardiovascular disease risk Associated with hypertension, diabetes,

ms.title: Pemantauan Tekanan Darah - Kategori AHA & Trend | CardioAnalytics
ms.description: Pantau tekanan darah dengan klasifikasi kategori AHA (Normal <120/80, Tahap 1, Tahap 2). Jejak trend sistolik/diastolik dan kurangkan risiko strok dan MI.
ms.content: Pemantauan Tekanan Darah Jejak tekanan sistolik dan diastolik dengan klasifikasi kategori AHA Apakah Tekanan Darah? Tekanan darah ialah daya darah menolak dinding arteri, diukur dalam milimeter raksa (mmHg). Ia mempunyai dua komponen: Tekanan sistolik - Nombor atas, mengukur tekanan apabila jantung berdegup (menguncup) Tekanan diastolik - Nombor bawah, mengukur tekanan apabila jantung berehat di antara degupan Contoh: Bacaan 120/80 mmHg bermakna 120 sistolik dan 80 diastolik. Mengapa Tekanan Dar

ms.title: ECG & Fibrilasi Atrium - Pengesanan AF Apple Watch | CardioAnalytics
ms.description: Simpan rakaman ECG Apple Watch yang diluluskan FDA. Jejak beban AF dan pemberitahuan denyutan tidak teratur dengan kepekaan dan kekhususan 95%. Pengesanan fibrilasi atrium.
ms.content: ECG & Fibrilasi Atrium Simpan rakaman ECG Apple Watch dan jejak beban fibrilasi atrium Apakah ECG dan Fibrilasi Atrium? Elektrokardiogram (ECG atau EKG) merekodkan aktiviti elektrik jantung. Apple Watch boleh mengambil ECG saluran tunggal dan mengesan fibrilasi atrium (AF) - irama jantung tidak teratur yang biasa. Mengapa Pengesanan AF Penting Fibrilasi atrium meningkatkan risiko strok dan komplikasi kardiovaskular lain: AF meningkatkan risiko strok sebanyak 5 kali ganda Sering tanpa simptom Pen

Kebolehubahan Kadar Jantung (HRV) mengukur variasi masa antara degupan jantung berturut-turut. HRV yang lebih tinggi secara amnya menunjukkan sistem saraf autonomi yang lebih sihat dan kapasiti penyesuaian yang lebih baik terhadap tekanan. Ketepuan oksigen (SpOâ‚‚) mengukur peratusan hemoglobin dalam darah anda yang mengandungi oksigen. Ia diukur menggunakan pulse oximetry, biasanya di hujung jari atau pergelangan tangan. ms.content: Kelajuan Menaiki Tangga Pantau kapasiti fungsi dan kuasa kaki dengan metrik mendaki tangga Apakah Kelajuan Menaiki Tangga? Kelajuan menaiki tangga mengukur seberapa cepat anda mendaki tangga, biasanya dalam meter sesaat (m/s). Ia mencerminkan kuasa kaki, kecergasan kardiovaskular, dan kapasiti fungsi keseluruhan. ms.content: VOâ‚‚ Max Pantau kecergasan kardiopulmonari anda - peramal kukuh risiko kematian Apakah VOâ‚‚ Max? VOâ‚‚ Max (pengambilan oksigen maksimum) mengukur jumlah maksimum oksigen yang badan anda boleh gunakan semasa senaman sengit. Ia dinyatakan dalam mL/kg/min dan merupakan penunjuk terbaik kecergasan kardiopulmonari. ms.content: Asimetri Berjalan Nilai keseimbangan gaya berjalan dan risiko jatuh dengan metrik Apple Mobility Apakah Asimetri Berjalan? Asimetri berjalan mengukur peratusan masa langkah berjalan anda tidak simetri antara kaki kiri dan kanan. Asimetri lebih tinggi boleh menunjukkan ketidakseimbangan gaya berjalan dan peningkatan risiko jatuh. ms.content: Kelajuan Berjalan "Tanda vital keenam" untuk kesihatan fungsi dan umur panjang Apakah Kelajuan Berjalan? Kelajuan berjalan mengukur seberapa cepat anda berjalan pada kadar mantap, biasanya diukur dalam meter sesaat (m/s). Ia dianggap sebagai "tanda vital keenam" kerana nilai ramalannya untuk hasil kesihatan. tl.title: Pagsubaybay sa Presyon ng Dugo - AHA Categories at Trends | CardioAnalytics
tl.description: Subaybayan ang presyon ng dugo na may AHA category classifications (Normal <120/80, Elevated, Stage 1, Stage 2). Subaybayan ang systolic/diastolic trends at bawasan ang stroke at MI risk.
tl.content: Pagsubaybay sa Presyon ng Dugo Subaybayan ang systolic at diastolic blood pressure na may AHA category classifications para sa hypertension risk assessment Ano ang Presyon ng Dugo? Ang presyon ng dugo ay ang lakas ng dugo na tumatama sa mga dingding ng inyong mga arterya. Sinusukat ito sa dalawang numero: Systolic Pressure (Itaas na numero) - Ang presyon kapag ang puso ay pumipintig at nag-push ng dugo sa mga arterya Diastolic Pressure (Ibabang numero) - Ang presyon kapag ang puso ay nagpapahing

tl.title: ECG at Atrial Fibrillation - Apple Watch ECG Recording | CardioAnalytics
tl.description: Mag-imbak ng FDA-approved Apple Watch ECG recordings. Subaybayan ang AFib burden at irregular pulse notifications na may 95% sensitivity at specificity.
tl.content: ECG at Atrial Fibrillation Mag-imbak ng FDA-approved Apple Watch ECG recordings at subaybayan ang atrial fibrillation burden Ano ang ECG at Atrial Fibrillation? Electrocardiogram (ECG o EKG) ay nagre-record ng electrical activity ng puso. Ang Apple Watch ay maaaring kumuha ng single-lead ECG gamit ang Digital Crown at back crystal. Atrial Fibrillation (AFib) ay ang pinakakaraniwang cardiac arrhythmia, na nag-aaffect ng 2-6 million Americans. Ang puso ay tumitibok nang irregular at kadalasang mas

tl.title: Pagsubaybay sa Tibok ng Puso - Resting, Walking at Current Heart Rate | CardioAnalytics
tl.description: Subaybayan ang resting, walking at current heart rate mula sa Apple Watch. Unawain ang normal ranges (60-100 tibok/min), tuklasin ang bradycardia at tachycardia na may personalized thresholds.
tl.content: Pagsubaybay sa Tibok ng Puso Subaybayan ang pahinga, paglakad at kasalukuyang tibok ng puso para sa pagtasa ng kardyobaskular na kalusugan Ano ang Tibok ng Puso? Ang tibok ng puso ay ang bilang ng beses na tumitibok ang inyong puso bawat minuto (tibok/min). Sinusukat ito sa iba't ibang antas ng aktibidad: Resting Heart Rate - Sinusukat kapag kayo ay ganap na nagpapahinga, pinakamabuti sa umaga bago bumangon sa kama Walking Heart Rate - Average na tibok ng puso sa panahon ng steady walking activi

tl.title: Pagkakaiba-iba ng Tibok ng Puso (HRV) - SDNN at RMSSD Tracking | CardioAnalytics
tl.description: Subaybayan ang HRV measurements (SDNN, RMSSD) upang tasahin ang kardyobaskular na kalusugan at stress levels. Mababang HRV ay nauugnay sa mas masamang health outcomes. Subaybayan ang nighttime trends.
tl.content: Pagkakaiba-iba ng Tibok ng Puso (HRV) Subaybayan ang SDNN at RMSSD na mga sukatan upang tasahin ang kardyobaskular na kalusugan at mga antas ng stress Ano ang Pagkakaiba-iba ng Tibok ng Puso? Ang Pagkakaiba-iba ng Tibok ng Puso (HRV) ay sumusukat sa variation sa oras sa pagitan ng magkakasunod na tibok ng puso. Ito ay isang marker ng autonomic nervous system function at pangkalahatang kardyobaskular na kalusugan. Mga Sukatan ng HRV: SDNN (Standard Deviation of NN intervals) - Sumusukat ng pangka

tl.title: Pagsubaybay sa Saturasyon ng Oksihena (SpOâ‚‚) - Hypoxia Detection | CardioAnalytics
tl.description: Subaybayan ang SpOâ‚‚ levels na may normal range indicators (95-100%). Makatanggap ng mga alerto para sa hypoxia (<90%) at subaybayan ang respiratory at kardyobaskular na kalusugan.
tl.content: Saturasyon ng Oksihena (SpOâ‚‚) Subaybayan ang mga antas ng blood oxygen saturation para sa respiratory at kardyobaskular na pagtasa ng kalusugan Ano ang Saturasyon ng Oksihena? Ang Saturasyon ng Oksihena (SpOâ‚‚) ay sumusukat sa porsyento ng hemoglobin sa dugo na may oxygen. Ito ay sinusukat gamit ang pulse oximetry, isang non-invasive na paraan na gumagamit ng light absorption. Ang normal na SpOâ‚‚ levels sa mga malusog na indibidwal ay 95-100%. Ang mga halaga na mas mababa sa 90% ay itinuturing na

tl.title: Bilis sa Pag-akyat ng Hagdan - Functional Capacity Marker | CardioAnalytics
tl.description: Subaybayan ang stair ascent/descent speed bilang early marker ng mobility decline. Tasasin ang leg strength at functional capacity.
tl.content: Bilis sa Pag-akyat ng Hagdan Subaybayan ang functional capacity at lakas ng binti sa pamamagitan ng stair descent/ascent speed Ano ang Bilis sa Pag-akyat ng Hagdan? Ang stair speed ay sumusukat sa gaano kabilis kayo umakyat o bumaba ng mga hagdan, ipinapahayag sa meters bawat segundo (m/s). Ang Apple ay pangunahing nag-track ng stair descent speed (bumaba) dahil ito ay mas predictive ng functional decline at fall risk. Ang normal na stair descent speed ay 0.7-0.9 m/s. tl.content: Suporta at Mga Madalas Itanong Tumutulong sa iyo na magsimula sa CardioAnalytics at sumagot sa mga karaniwang tanong Makipag-ugnayan sa Suporta May mga tanong o nangangailangan ng tulong? Makipag-ugnayan sa amin gamit ang form sa ibaba o mag-email sa info@onmedic.com {{ ui.contact.name }} * {{ ui.contact.email }} * {{ ui.contact.message }} * {{ ui.contact.send }} Mga Madalas Itanong (FAQs) Gaano ka-accurate ang VOâ‚‚ Max estimates? tl.title: VOâ‚‚ Max - Cardiovascular Fitness Tracking | CardioAnalytics
tl.description: Subaybayan ang VOâ‚‚ Max bilang powerful mortality risk predictor. Subaybayan ang cardiorespiratory fitness trends at optimize ang training zones.
tl.content: VOâ‚‚ Max - Kardyobaskular na Fitness Subaybayan ang inyong cardiorespiratory fitness at mortality risk marker Ano ang VOâ‚‚ Max? VOâ‚‚ Max (Maximum Oxygen Uptake) ay sumusukat sa maximum na dami ng oxygen na magagamit ng katawan sa panahon ng intense exercise. Ito ay ipinapahayag sa milliliters ng oxygen bawat kilogram ng body weight bawat minuto (ml/kg/min). Ang VOâ‚‚ Max ay ang "gold standard" measurement ng cardiorespiratory fitness at isa sa pinakamalakas na predictors ng long-term health at mortal

tl.title: Asymmetry ng Paglakad - Gait Balance Assessment | CardioAnalytics
tl.description: Tasahin ang gait balance at fall risk na may validated Apple Mobility metrics. Subaybayan ang asymmetry para sa injury detection at rehabilitation.
tl.content: Asymmetry ng Paglakad Tasahin ang balanse ng lakad at panganib ng pagkahulog gamit ang validated Apple Mobility metrics Ano ang Asymmetry ng Paglakad? Ang walking asymmetry ay sumusukat sa pagkakaiba sa walking pattern sa pagitan ng kaliwa at kanang bahagi ng katawan. Ito ay ipinapahayag bilang porsyento - ang mas mataas na porsyento ay nangangahulugang mas malaking asymmetry. Ang normal na walking asymmetry ay karaniwang <5%. Ang mga halaga na >10% ay maaaring mag-indicate ng gait abnormalities

tl.title: Bilis ng Paglakad - The Sixth Vital Sign | CardioAnalytics
tl.description: Subaybayan ang walking speed bilang vital marker ng functional health. Speeds <0.8 m/s ay nag-indicate ng increased risk. Subaybayan ang mobility trends.
tl.content: Bilis ng Paglakad Subaybayan ang "ikaanim na vital sign" para sa functional health at mobility assessment Ano ang Bilis ng Paglakad? Ang bilis ng paglakad ay sumusukat sa gaano kabilis kayo naglalakad, karaniwang ipinapahayag sa meters bawat segundo (m/s) o kilometers bawat oras (km/h). Ito ay kinikilala bilang "ikaanim na vital sign" dahil sa malakas na predictive value para sa health outcomes. Ang normal na comfortable walking speed para sa mga matatanda ay 1.2-1.4 m/s. Ang mga bilis na mas ma

tl.title: Pagsubaybay sa Timbang at BMI - Obesity Risk Assessment | CardioAnalytics
tl.description: Subaybayan ang body weight at BMI na may healthy range indicators (18.5-24.9 kg/mÂ²). Subaybayan ang mga risk factors sa kardyobaskular at metabolic health.
tl.content: Timbang at Indeks ng Masa ng Katawan (BMI) Subaybayan ang bigat ng katawan at BMI bilang mga risk factors para sa kardyobaskular na sakit Ano ang Timbang at BMI? Body Mass Index (BMI) ay isang measurement ng body fat batay sa taas at timbang. Kinakalkula ito bilang: BMI = timbang (kg) / taas (m)Â² Habang hindi perpekto (hindi ito nag-distinguish sa pagitan ng muscle at fat mass), ang BMI ay isang widely-used screening tool para sa weight-related health risks. sw.title: Ufuatiliaji wa shinikizo la damu - Kategoria za AHA na mwelekeo | CardioAnalytics
sw.description: Fuatilia shinikizo la damu na uainishaji wa kategoria za AHA (Kawaida <120/80, Hatua ya 1, Hatua ya 2). Fuatilia mwelekeo wa systolic/diastolic na upunguze hatari ya kiharusi na mshtuko wa moyo.
sw.content: Ufuatiliaji wa shinikizo la damu Fuatilia shinikizo la systolic na diastolic na uainishaji wa kategoria za AHA Shinikizo la damu ni nini? Shinikizo la damu ni nguvu ya damu inayosukuma kuta za mishipa, inapimwa kwa millimeters ya mercury (mmHg). Ina sehemu mbili: Shinikizo la systolic - Nambari ya juu, inapima shinikizo moyo unapopiga (kusukuma) Shinikizo la diastolic - Nambari ya chini, inapima shinikizo moyo unapolala kati ya mapigo Mfano: Usomaji wa 120/80 mmHg unamaanisha 120 systolic na 80

ECG (electrocardiogram) - Rekodi ya shughuli ya umeme ya moyo. Apple Watch inatoa rekodi za ECG za chaneli moja. Atrial fibrillation (AF) - Mapigo yasiyokuwa ya kawaida ya moyo ambapo atria zinapiga kwa haraka badala ya kusukuma kwa kawaida. Inaweza kuongeza hatari ya kiharusi. Kwa nini ECG na kugundua atrial fibrillation ni muhimu ECG ya Apple W

sw.content: Kasi ya kutembea Fuatilia "kiashiria cha sita cha muhimu" cha afya ya kazi Kasi ya kutembea ni nini? Kasi ya kutembea ni kasi yako ya wastani ya kutembea, inapimwa kwa mita kwa sekunde (m/s). Apple Watch inaelekeza kasi ya kutembea wakati wa mwendo wa kawaida wa kutembea. Kasi ya kutembea inachukuliwa kama "kiashiria cha sita cha muhimu" - kiashiria kikubwa cha afya ya jumla na kazi. Kwa nini kasi ya kutembea ni muhimu Kasi ya kutembea ni kiashiria kikubwa cha afya ya kazi, hatari ya kifo na ubo
